name: astuto
description: Astuto is an open-source feedback platform that lets users vote on feature requests and view development progress. It helps product teams transparently share roadmap updates and manage customer feedback.

features.title: Feedback Platform
features.description: Collect and organize customer feature requests. Listen to your users

features.title: Voting System
features.description: Let users vote on features they want most. Prioritize democratically

features.title: Roadmap Sharing
features.description: Transparently share development progress and plans. Build trust

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Keep users informed about feature development stages. Clear communication

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Own your feedback data and customer relationships. Complete control

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Help teams make data-driven product decisions. Build what matters
